value.title: Understanding the TIMELINE in DAX Studio
value.excerpt: We brought Marco in to help explain the TIMELINE update within DAX Studio. This can help you understand performance a bit deeper when optimizing your DAX and models. This is one to watch!  DAX Studio https://daxstudio.org  Marco Russo https://twitter.com/marcorus https://www.linkedin.com/in/sqlbi/ https://sqlbi.com

value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at what a Power BI tenant is. This is really the Azure Active Directory / Office 365 tenant that contains your users, groups, subscriptions and more. value.title: What is Power BI Gateway? Do You Need it to Connect to On-Premise Data? Can You Avoid Using One?
value.excerpt: Power BI Gateway acts as a bridge to let PowerBI.com (Cloud) connect to your On-Premise (Local) Data Sources – like local Excel Files or a local SQL Server.   Watch our complete video series on Power BI Gateways: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7GQQXV5Z8edw57_eLqD9By5mzxIqxSJ1 1. What is a Power
